title: Worst app ever for sellers
text: After being a seller for 8+ years I tried to sell my authentic vintage Louis purse and they BLOCKED my account, even though I sent all proof of authentication. No one was able to give me a real response. Do not try to sell anything of value here because they will block you. Outrageous.

title: Zero buyer protection
text:
If the seller lies blatantly about the condition of the item you buy, you will have to pay for the return shipping and the seller will not be penalized in any way for such malpractice. 

I even opened a PayPal dispute, and PayPal sided with Vinted, that‚Äôs all you need to know about one hand washing the other. Take care, this is borderline scam.
